issue.title: [Java] Allow UnionListWriter to write null values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8646](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8646). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
UnionListWriter has no provision to skip an index to write a null value into the list.

It should allow to writeNull
